name: Turnkey Technologies, Inc.
description:
Turnkey Technologies, Inc. is an owner-led business consulting firm and Gold Microsoft Partner with a growing team of subject matter experts representing several enterprise resource planning and customer engagement solutions. Since 1994, our time-tested methodology has provided transformative results as defined by our customers.
Turnkey offers comprehensive project management, implementation, deployment, customization, training and support services for the solutions we provide. We invest time to gain understanding in every relationship, enabling us to become an extension of your team. We also apply best practices to help you push the boundaries while staying within your limits, so you can achieve your goals no matter where you are on your digital transformation journey. Turnkey is fully committed to transparency throughout every project. Before we begin any implementation, we hold important discovery sessions where we establish your short-term and long-term requirements. After understanding what drives your business, our team designs the perfect solution for your goals and technical environment. Once your solution is live, you can count on us for ongoing enhancements and support.
